item.title: Amy Coney Barrett’s Judicial Philosophy
item.description: Amy Coney Barrett’s Judicial Philosophy Judge Amy Coney Barrett is the Trump administration’s nominee to fill Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s seat on the Supreme Court of the United States. She has been on the 7th US Circuit Court of Appeals since 2017, and her time as an appellate court judge, while short in length, gives insight into her judicial philosophy. By her description, she is an originalist and a textualist. Her core convictions follow the approach of Justice Antonin Scalia: “A judge must apply the law as written.
